reporter_caption.center: STEGEN v. NEUSS, HESSLEIN CO., INC., 238 App. Div. 829 (1933)

caption.center: LAURENT VAN DER STEGEN, Doing Business under the Firm Name and Style of THE
BELGIAN TRADING COMPANY, Respondent, and FREDERICK N. MATTHEWS and Others,
Respondents, v. NEUSS, HESSLEIN Co., INC., Appellant.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Order affirmed, with twenty dollars costs and disbursements. No opinion.
